TopicTitle: The game goes crazy after loading saves

Articles.Content: Time becomes 999 y, 499 d, all world disappears and i can do nothing. The last mod I installed was Parallax with it's dependencies but it didn't work properly. Think better uninstall them.

Does this happen with any save, or just a specific one? Try making a new save and loading that, does the same thing happen?

Logs please:

On 2/7/2023 at 1:33 PM, jimmymcgoochie said:

Does this happen with any save, or just a specific one? Try making a new save and loading that, does the same thing happen?

 

With some saves only. Actually, this thing had happen only two times. Firstly I couldn't load my space station because of this(that wasn't even a specific save, I just couldn't get to it from tracking station) and secondly I've been trying to land on Minmus. Firstly nothing special happened but then I loaded save before landing and then comes crash. I even couldn't turn the game off because there was no ability to open menu.

 

Now I've deleted Parallax and Outer planets mod(These things started after I installed them) but nothing changed.

Don't know if these mods are what you need but here: https://disk.yandex.ru/d/wH26JyHo2OprYQ
